content:
I apologize for not meeting the 4-letter criteria earlier. Here are 15 four-letter words related to cooking:

1. Bake
2. Boil
3. Chop
4. Sear
5. Melt
6. Stir
7. Fold
8. Dice
9. Fry
10. Wok
11. Stew
12. Whip
13. Toss
14. Beat
15. Pure (as in puree, a technique to blend or process food until smooth)

These words should fit the 4-letter requirement while remaining relevant to cooking.
